holidays.title: Bison-ten Yell Day
holidays.description: Join us as we learn more about this holiday that has nothing to do with bison.

holidays.title: Calendar Adjustment Day
holidays.description: Join us as we learn more about the fascinating history behind this day.

holidays.title: Ceuta Day
holidays.description: Take a break from your routines and spend a quiet day at home this Ceuta Day.

holidays.title: Death of Prophet Muhammad
holidays.description: Take time to reflect on the teachings of the Prophet Muhammad as we honor his death.

holidays.title: Independence Day of Vietnam
holidays.description: National Day of Vietnam, or Independence Day of Vietnam, is a festive occasion!

holidays.title: Mouthguard Day
holidays.description: Let's encourage people to wear mouthguards to reduce the risk of broken teeth and jaws!

holidays.title: National Blueberry Popsicle Day
holidays.description: The underrated blueberry popsicle flavor is celebrated today.

holidays.title: National Live Fearless Day
holidays.description: Let's acknowledge an area in our lives where we feel fear and do something about it!

holidays.title: Pierce Your Ears Day
holidays.description: Beauty is sometimes painful! Join us as we dive into the background of ear piercing.

holidays.title: Spalding Baseball Day
holidays.description: Come join us to witness the dramatic moments of a baseball game while hitting a fly ball.

holidays.title: Umhlanga reed dance Day
holidays.description: Umhlanga Reed Dance Day is a grand celebration of purity and girlhood.

holidays.title: VJ Day
holidays.description: V-J Day, commemorates a shift in the Second World War in favor of the Allies.

holidays.title: West Indian Day Parade
holidays.description: West Indian culture is colorful and multifaceted. But what do we mean by "West Indian?"

holidays.title: World Coconut Day
holidays.description: You can’t make a piña colada or a decent Thai curry without it.

holidays.title: Camille Grammer’s Birthday
holidays.description: She was one of the most interesting characters on “The Real Housewives of Beverly Hills.”

holidays.title: Charles Trippy’s Birthday
holidays.description: He has given vlogs a new meaning and is on his way to even bigger things.

holidays.title: Eugenio Derbez’s Birthday
holidays.description: Whether performing physically or voice acting, he is renowned for adding humor to movies.

holidays.title: Faye Chrisley’s Birthday
holidays.description: This reality T.V. star best plays the role of a loving and dedicated mother.

holidays.title: Hayley LeBlanc’s Birthday
holidays.description: After her meteoric rise to fame, the young star is now ready to rule the world.

holidays.title: Katt Williams’s Birthday
holidays.description: This multi-talented actor and comedian has made a big name for himself in Hollywood.

holidays.title: Keanu Reeves’s Birthday
holidays.description: In 2014, he started playing the legendary assassin in the “John Wick” franchise.

holidays.title: Kian Lawley’s Birthday
holidays.description: This YouTube homeboy and actor will make your heart skip a beat!

holidays.title: Leah Ashe’s Birthday
holidays.description: This multifaceted YouTube star has a colorful personality and videos to match.

holidays.title: Mark Harmon’s Birthday
holidays.description: This award-winning actor has garnered thousands of fans around the world.

holidays.title: Patrick Cloud’s Birthday
holidays.description: One of Cloud’s shows, “Roast Me”, has blown up and become a phenomenon.

holidays.title: Salma Hayek’s Birthday
holidays.description: She’s an unstoppable, multi-talented artist; well-known Mexican star who’s made a name for herself in Hollywood.
